position.title: Java Developer
position.description: Development and maintenance of the company's core product, FindAndBook, in its relation to the suppliers websites. Online datamining (web-scraping of the websites to retrieve all required information) Maintenance of the Viewdata application. Writing of functional specifications for the integration of new modules.

position.title: Software Engineer - Java EE, PHP
position.description: Management and realization of different internal projects : SMS, email and mail information campaigns sending platform: - Conception of the evolutions, realization, tests, deployment, support - Java, Oracle, GWT, Hibernate, JasperReports, Tomcat Company's website recruiting portal: - Realization of some evolutions, tests, deployment, support - PHP, MySQL, PHP-MVC, Apache HTTPD Several webservices, called by different internal applications : - Conception, realization, tests, deployment, support - Java, Axis2, Oracle, Tomcat Missions for clients : Web porting of a VB application: - Conception, realization, tests, deployment, support - PHP, PostGreSql, JavaScript, jQuery, jQGrid, Apache HTTPD Realization of an audit application : - Conception, realization, tests, deployment, support - PHP, PostGreSql, JavaScript, Apache HTTPD

position.title: Intern - Software developer
